text.section: In Part VIII of this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Hazardous condition" means a condition existing in a related institution that does not constitute a life-threatening, health, or fire safety deficiency, as described in § 19-328 of this subtitle, but which is a violation of departmental regulations which is likely to endanger the health, life, or safety of patients.
"Intermediate sanction" means the establishment of an escrow account by a related institution.
